entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
